events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will begin reviewing your details shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering based on your experience with software development and related skills.
A recruiter with expertise in software engineering roles has been assigned to your application to guide you through the recruitment process.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background, skills, and motivation for the software engineer position.
Thank you for your prompt and detailed responses during the initial screening, which helped us better understand your fit.
We have scheduled your technical interview for the software engineer role on May 10th at 10:00 AM UTC.
Your technical interview went well, covering coding challenges and system design related to software development.
We scheduled your HR interview for May 15th to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career goals.
The HR interview was completed successfully with good alignment on your expectations and the companyâ€™s values.
We are pleased to propose you an official offer for the software engineer position including salary, benefits, and start date.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You officially accepted the offer, confirming your intent to join the software engineering team and proceed with onboarding.
Your onboarding process has started, including paperwork, access setup, and introduction to our engineering projects and team.
The hiring process is officially closed, and you have been successfully integrated into our engineering department.
